---
title: "BARBARIT"
format: html
---

```{r}
here::i_am("lab-grades.Rproj")
library(here)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(vroom)
```

```{r}
courses <- vroom(here("data","courses.csv"))
```


```{r}
courses |>
  rename(
    "course name" = course,
    "identifier" = course_id,
    "module" = module,
    "number of exams" = nb_grades
  ) |>
  arrange(`course name`) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
